Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Cubs are on an eight-game road win streak heading into the game.
The Los Angeles Dodgers have a strong home record and are favored in the matchup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the sixth meeting between the two teams this season, with the Cubs leading 4-1.
The Dodgers have key players like Shohei Ohtani and Mookie Betts in good form.
Others: Both teams have several injured players, which may impact the game.
